name: Professor Evelyn Morgan
traits: Brilliant, eccentric, often lost in thought and scribbling equations on napkins.
motivation: To understand the fundamental nature of reality, which she believes is not what it seems.
secret: Using a high-energy device of her own creation, she has managed to briefly open a microscopic 'window' to a dimension of impossible geometry and shrieking colors. The experience has started to affect her perception of space and time.
hook: The investigators encounter a strange energy phenomenon or need an expert on theoretical physics.
